name: PrivateSniper's Style :: Battlelog v1.0
description: Removes some of the unnecessary items from battlelog.

user.name: PrivateSniper
user.about: Welcome to my UserStyles.org profile, alot of my styles are related to adblocking, some of my styles also include color theme options (usually just the color theme I have used but I am willing to add multi-choice if requested). I am more than happy to receive requests if your patient. Style Options Styles who's descriptions end with :: indicate that they have options which can be configured (this is a new pattern I am using to be able to quickly locate styles with or without options.

additional_info:
v1.0
removes some of the footer
removes the hint section
